div.p: ML MSS.200/3, folder 2, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

It affords me much pleasure to recommend David Lindsay Esqr, F.R.G.S. for the position of Shire-Engineer and Surveyor of Portland,
Vic. for which position he is eminently qualified by his professional standing and experiences. Moreover Mr Lindsay is known to me as a Gentleman of high principles and agreable kindly disposition, so that the choice, should it fall on him, will be a particularly happy one.
